problem.p: For a simple compressible system at rest execting a reversible cycle, the area in the [mathjaxinline]p-V[/mathjaxinline] diagram and the area in the [mathjaxinline]T-S[/mathjaxinline] diagram are equal.

div.p: In this case, the [mathjaxinline]p-V[/mathjaxinline] area represents work done, and the [mathjaxinline]T-S[/mathjaxinline] area represents heat transfer. For a cycle, they are equal (First Law).
